I have a PhD in nuclear and particle physics. At Fermilab and the University of Minnesota, I built and operated particle detectors to collect trillions of images of particle collisions. I led technical teams, maintained production software, and developed neural networks to learn about the fundamental quantum nature of our universe. I have 10+ years of experience in technical mentorship and teaching across physics, software, data science, and ML. I place strong emphasis on clear and accessible technical communication. :::
